GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.10.130
GSD.description:
can: gs_usb: gs_usb_open/close(): fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.130 by commit d0b8e223998866b3e7b2895927d4e9689b0a80d8, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit d08e973a77d128b25e01a08c34d89593fdf222da. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: can: gs_usb: gs_usb_open/close(): fix memory leak
